name: COMBAT INSTINCT
description: Fight like hell in this real-man fight and adventure game dedicated to hard-core action gamers. Get prepared for lots of deaths, and see whether you’re the talented fighter the galaxy has been waiting for.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 Storage: 11 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 Storage: 11 GB available space
